titles.title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide improved reimbursement for clinical social worker services under the Medicare program.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S4121)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 3/31/1993--Introduced. Electoral Rights Enforcement Act of 1995 - Authorizes each State or the people thereof to prescribe the maximum number of terms to which a person may be elected or appointed to the Senate or the House of Representatives.
